ThingDef.label: plague lesions
ThingDef.description: These lesions do not close and maintain the appearance of an open wound. Once the host takes damage however, they expel a noxious plague that infects whoever hurt the host in melee.

ThingDef.label: reinforced tortoise shell
ThingDef.description: These exceptionally durable shells line the torso of the host, providing exceptional protection. However, their weight slows down the host by a decent amount.
